      Previous page
      Next page

      AI Convertible 6-in-1 Cooling

      With AI Convertible 6-in-1 cooling, the user gets the flexibility to increase or decrease cooling capacity as per requirement.

      Previous page

      1. Auto Clean

        Heat exchanger in the AC automatically dried up, eliminating humidity, mold and bacteria along with odor.

      2. HD Filter with Anti-Virus Protection

        Special HD Filter coated with cationic silver ions for 99.76% virus filtration & up to 99% bacteria cleansing.

      3. Monsoon Comfort

        LG Air Conditioners with Monsoon Comfort technology efficiently control room temperature, air movement, and humidity, even in humid conditions, you can enjoy comfortable cooling and save energy.

      4. Stabilizer-Free-Operation

        LG's enhanced stabilizer-free* plus operation prevents voltage fluctuations without compromising on safety, savings, and comfort.

      Next page

      Mute Function

      Silent remote control buttons eliminate the disturbing beep sounds while operating the AC

      ADC Sensor

      LG Air Conditioners with ADC safety sensor, making robustness and power of safety at every step of operation.

      4 Way Swing

      The horizontal and vertical swing action ensures better airflow while giving uniform cooling

      Previous page

      1. Ocean Black Fin

        LG DUALCOOL ACs come with ocean black fin to offer unbeatable protection against dust, smoke and chemical presents in the environment.

      3. Hi-Grooved Copper

        Hi-Grooved Copper pipes serve dual benefits of better heat dissipation of refrigerant & increasing the durability of pipes.

      4. Low Gas Detection

        LG Air Conditioners are designed to detect low gas levels which can leave the room hot and uncomfortable.

      5. R32 Refrigerant

        R32 is a highly efficient refrigerant with a lower global warming potential as compared to R410, a commonly found refrigerant in resident Air Conditioners.
